doc.summary: Gets the amount of lines, that should be skipped for the special content.
doc.text: Gets the amount of lines, that should be skipped for the special content.

doc.summary: Creates a copy of this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/content/CaptionContent">CaptionContent</ref> with a new caption set.
doc.text: Creates a copy of this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/content/CaptionContent">CaptionContent</ref> with a new caption set.

parameters.name: caption
parameters.doc: The text for that special page. All other text is added to regular text pages after this one.

doc.summary: Builds the special page for this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/content/CaptionContent">CaptionContent</ref>.
doc.text: Builds the special page for this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/content/CaptionContent">CaptionContent</ref>.

doc.summary: Gets whether regular (non-caption) text can merge to this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/content/CaptionContent">CaptionContent</ref>.
doc.text: Gets whether regular (non-caption) text can merge to this CaptionContent. Default is false.

doc.summary: Base class for pages with some special content that can be followed by some text.
doc.text: Base class for pages with some special content that can be followed by some text. This class will handle  merging with other caption content and splitting the text up on multiple pages if required.
